titleInfo.title: Cars and Student Barracks in the Snow, 1950

mods.abstract: Cars and and the barracks at Christian Brothers College were covered in snow in the winter of 1950. The barracks were temporary structures used during World War II. They were acquired by CBC through the Federal Public Housing Authority to use as student housing for returning GIs.
mods.accessCondition: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law.
